item.title: 2006Redone || Runescape 2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

[quote=“RuneEden, post:79, topic:450912”][quote author=AtomicInt_ link=topic=553789.msg4077551#msg4077551 date=1344995325]

Imsuperman05 was debugging for well over two hours. We couldn’t find the issue.

I would compare it to the code in another source just to see if something is missing.

We compared to original source code to current. There were no modifications. Other than client stuff. But what in the client would fuck up interface opening??
[/quote]

I thought you said the trade screen only opens for 1 player, meaning the player that first offered the trade? If so this would be a server sided problem wouldn’t it?[/quote]

It would, but when it comes to big problems like this you have to think outside of the box and try everything

Read full topic

item.title: 2006Redone || Runescape 2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @RuneEden RuneEden
item.description:
@RuneEden wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:78, topic:450912”][quote author=RuneEden link=topic=553789.msg4077544#msg4077544 date=1344994564]

Imsuperman05 was debugging for well over two hours. We couldn’t find the issue.

I would compare it to the code in another source just to see if something is missing.
[/quote]

We compared to original source code to current. There were no modifications. Other than client stuff. But what in the client would fuck up interface opening??[/quote]

I thought you said the trade screen only opens for 1 player, meaning the player that first offered the trade? If so this would be a server sided problem wouldn’t it? I don’t think anything in the client would deal with it but I’m not sure, I’ve never messed around with coding clients.

Read full topic

[/quote]

I would compare it to the code in another source just to see if something is missing.[/quote]

We compared to original source code to current. There were no modifications. Other than client stuff. But what in the client would fuck up interface opening??

item.title: 2006Redone || Runescape 2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:72, topic:450912”]There’s some fucking weird bug with trading (where the trade screen only opens for one player) four different people look at it (including myself)
I started at it for more than a hour reading over and over. Everything looks totally fine. I don’t understand.[/quote]

Any guesses why? There’s something your missing, focus on the things that you think WOULDN’T cause the problem, thats where it gets you

Read full topic

There’s some fucking weird bug with trading (where the trade screen only opens for one player) four different people look at it (including myself)

item.title: 2006Redone || Runescape 2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @RuneEden RuneEden
item.description:
@RuneEden wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:70, topic:450912”][quote author=RuneEden link=topic=553789.msg4077266#msg4077266 date=1344970543]

Well, I would imagine that it was indeed a lot of work wasted, the fact that many of the moderators and staff members spent hours on the forums answering stuff and what not tells me a lot, any who, I wish for the best if this were to come back.

He could at least try to sell it to a different developer to continue it or maybe if worse comes to worse release this with some type of anti-leech. I’m sure just about any of the errors he was pointing out could be fixed in some way, why throw it all away?
[/quote]There not errors like I said. And I cbf with this source anymore. I’m just going to take a break, and maybe continue it some other time.[/quote]

Sounds good ;), just don’t give up on it. It’s a job well done.

Read full topic

I’m sure just about any of the errors he was pointing out could be fixed in some way, why throw it all away?[/quote]There not errors like I said. And I cbf with this source anymore. I’m just going to take a break, and maybe continue it some other time.

item.title: 2006Redone || Runescape 2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:65, topic:450912”]No he’s not^

Development hasn’t stopped just got very bored of the 2006 revision and there were a couple bugs that I couldn’t fix in the current base that I spent to long trying to fix and it wasn’t worth spending any longer trying to fix.

My new plans not for sure what I’m going to do but I’m doing one of these for sure:

  1. Either start on a 459 and use some of this content but try to actually rewrite a lot
  2. Work with this source but actually fix the error probably isn’t possible
  3. Start a new base based on 377 again and just start over…
  4. Start a server that loads 600 +

I’d do an actual 498 Hyperion with you if you were up to it. (in the future, currently too busy to do it now)[/quote]Alright I wouldn’t mind trying to that, if you were up to it. That would probably be more of a learning project though…

Read full topic

My new plans not for sure what I’m going to do but I’m doing one of these for sure:

  1. Either start on a 459 and use some of this content but try to actually rewrite a lot
  2. Work with this source but actually fix the error probably isn’t possible
  3. Start a new base based on 377 again and just start over…
  4. Start a server that loads 600 +[/quote]

I’d do an actual 498 Hyperion with you if you were up to it. (in the future, currently too busy to do it now)

Read full topic

item.title: 2006Redone || Runescape 2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @Stool Stool
item.description:
@Stool wrote:

Man, this looked like a great project, one of the best I’ve seen in my nooby-life
Shame to see you stop working on it, would have been amazing when finished!
Quick question - Are you releasing your work to the community to see if they can fix any problems/errors?
Anyway, great work.

Read full topic

item.title: 2006Redone || Runescape 2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“xxxtilllyxxx, post:62, topic:450912”]What are the errors? Post them and a few of the community members could help.[/quote]There not acctual errors I’ve spent a whole trying to fix it but I found out basically dueling/trading/any interfaces that go on two clients don’t work because basically if you get on one client and type the interface command or tele command and have another client open then it will do it on the other client instead of yours. So that’s the current problem. Btw i typed this out on my phone if it looks weird.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx

My new plans not for sure what I’m going to do but I’m doing one of these for sure:
